sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Reconnaissance Platoon conducts M4 group and zero, MK22, M2010, day and night qualification and M240L familiarization fire on 09 October 2024 to build confidence in primary weapon systems and improve combat readiness.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide the Recon Platoon with the opportunity to participate for familiarization training, Data collection, and Rapid Target Engagement Practices.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct group and zero M4 Iron Sights
Conduct Weapon System Familiarization and gather data
Conduct Rapid Target Engagement
MG Teams Familiarization Fire
sections.END STATE:
The Recon Platoon successfully conducts M4 Iron Sight group and zero to practice the first graded Sniper School event. The Platoon will also become familiarized with the three main weapon systems as well as proficient in rapid target engagement and data collection.
Training Objectives
Conduct M4 Iron Sight 25 Meter Group and Zero
Conduct daytime Sniper system familiarization
Gather data for future engagements
Conduct night Sniper system familiarization Conduct rapid target engagement techniques
Gather data and practice for Sniper School
MG Team Drills MG Familiarization Fire 600m – 1000m on Tripod
